data.name: Warmonium
data.detailed_description:
Warmonium is a turn based, tactical, high fantasy game. It is the first of its kind in that it includes multilevel pathfinding on a hex-based tile map.
With this new approach, players are able to expand their strategic mind and experience fluid gameplay like no other.
Fans of strategy war games will experience the influence of 90s board games come to life.
Warmonium caters to the casual and competitive player, from ranked playlists to player made maps.

Included in the base version of Warmonium are the following features:
- 12 Champions
- 8 Squads
- Map editor
- Deck builder
- Online play
- Player stats
- Ranking system

data.short_description: Featuring team fighting turn based tactics with multilevel pathfinding. Inspired by 90's board games it's a fantasy come true for fans of strategy war games! Catering to the casual and competitive player, from ranked games to custom maps.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows® 7, 64-bit
  • Processor: Intel Core 2 Duo E4700 2.6 GHz or AMD Phenom 9950 Quad Core 2.6 GHz
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 1GB ATI Radeon HD 5770, 1GB NVIDIA GeForce GTX 460 or better
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 15 GB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX compatible sound card
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows® 10, 64-bit
  • Processor: 3GHz Quad Core
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 2GB ATI Radeon HD 7970, 2GB NVIDIA GeForce GTX 770 or better
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 15 GB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX compatible sound card
